text: 4.1 IPv4 Header VER (4 bits) HL (4 bits) Services (8 bits) Total Length (16 bits) Identification number (16 bits) Flags (3 bits) Fragment offset (13 bits) Time to Live (8 bits) Protocol (8 bits) Header checksum (16 bits) Source IP Address (32 bits) Destination IP Address (32 bits) Option (0-40 bytes)
